segments.text: I've found a nice place in this district.Three bedrooms , a large kitchen , high ceilings , a tile bath and a big drawing room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It sounds nice , but don't forget this is a seedy , run-down neighborhood .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about the one on the Yellow River Road ? It's a two-bedroom one , and renovated building with an eat-in kitchen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a bit small but looks nice.What ' s more , it's only ten minutes ' walk to the company .
segments.speaker: S2
